item.title: Compileing errors please help :s
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

It can’t find the NPC class.

If the NPC class isn’t in the same package (or “folder”) as your CombatAssistant class you’ll have to import it.

Read full topic

Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerIndex];

c.clawDamage = Misc.random(calculateMeleeMaxHit() +

Misc.random(4));
}
c.clawIndex = c.playerIndex;
c.clawType = 1;
} else if (c.npcIndex > 0) {
NPC n = Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.npcIndex];
if (Misc.random(calculateMeleeAttack()) >

Misc.random(n.defence)) {

this is my code thats throwing the error would i maybe change it up so its like NPC n = the file path to npc class [c.npcIndex];

item.title: Compileing errors please help :s
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

Class NPC.
The proper term for a Java file is “Class” for example; The Client class… The NPC class, The CombatAssistant Class.

What this error is saying is that it can’t find the NPC class. Maybe you’ve forgotten to import it?

Read full topic
